states.name: California
states.description: California teacher certification exams include CBEST for basic skills and CSET for subject matter competency.

exams.name: CSET Multiple Subjects
exams.fullName: California Subject Examinations for Teachers: Multiple Subjects
exams.description: Required for elementary teaching credentials. Covers all subjects taught at the elementary level.
subtests: Subtest I: Reading, Language & Literature, History & Social Science
Subtest III: Physical Education, Human Development, Visual & Performing Arts

exams.name: CBEST
exams.description: Basic skills test in reading, mathematics, and writing for prospective teachers.
exams.note: As of 2024, CBEST is no longer required if you hold a bachelor's degree

states.name: New York
states.description: New York teacher certification exams include NYSTCE assessments for various teaching certificates.

exams.name: NYSTCE EAS
exams.fullName: New York State Teacher Certification Examinations: Educating All Students
exams.description: Required for all teaching certificates. Assesses knowledge and skills in areas applicable to all classroom settings.

exams.name: NYSTCE CST: Multi-Subject
exams.fullName: New York State Teacher Certification Examinations: Content Specialty Test for Multi-Subject Teachers
subtests: The Fine Arts, Health, and Fitness

states.name: Texas
states.description: Texas teacher certification exams (TExES) measure content and pedagogical knowledge for teaching roles.

exams.name: TExES Core Subjects EC-6
exams.fullName: Texas Examinations of Educator Standards: Core Subjects EC-6
exams.description: Required for early childhood through 6th grade generalist certification.
subtests: Fine Arts, Health, and Physical Education
